channel.title: Scene on Explore the World
channel.description: Recent content in Scene on Explore the World

item.title: Replication of the Spread of True and False News Online
item.description: According to the data and code shared by the researchers, I replicate the results of the study. Access to the paper:http://science.sciencemag.org/content/359/6380/1146 Author Soroush Vosoughi, Deb Roy, Sinan Aral Central Findings They found that false news was more novel than true news, which suggests that people were more likely to share novel information. Whereas false stories inspired fear, disgust, and surprise in replies, true stories inspired anticipation, sadness, joy, and trust.

item.title: Chapter I: The Grand Hall
item.description: Education Master of Communication, Nanjing University, September 2017-present Supervisor: Prof. Naipeng Chao co-supervised by Prof. Cheng-Jun Wang Bachelor of Communication, Sun Yet-san University, September 2013-June 2017 GPA:4.0/5.0 (5⁄61) Exchange study, City University of Hong Kong, August 2015-December 2015 Summer School, University of Westminster(UK), July 2015-August 2015 Research Interests Computational communication Computational social science Health communication Publications Scholarships Honor for Academic Excellence, 2013-2015
